javadoc:
The model that backs the {@link FVTable} table. This model defines 4 columns: date,
 time, log level, and the message.

methods.name: addRow
methods.comment: Adds a row to the model.

params.name: notify
params.comment: if true, a notification will be sent to subscribers

methods.comment: Returns the date portion of the given string.

return.comment: the date, or empty string if not present

name: FVTableModel
comment:
The model that backs the FVTable table. This model defines 4 columns: date,
 time, log level, and the message.
